description.en: Knowledge of exercise study and training specialities with acquisition of practical skills of assistant coach (EstQF3). Basic knowledge of training and compiling practice diary are aquired.
description.et: Treeninguõpetuse ja sportliku treeningu erialaste teadmiste õppimine koos praktiliste oskuste ja abitreeneri (EKR3) töö vahetu kogemuse omandamisega. Õpetatakse treeningu ülesehituse baasteadmisi ja praktikapäeviku koostamist.

objectives.en: Learning and practicing the work of assistant coach (EstQF3) in sports club training group in cooperation with the coach of the sports club and supervising instructor from University.
objectives.et: Abitreeneri (EKR3) tööülesannete õppimine ning praktiseerimine spordiklubi treeninggrupi juures koostöös spordiklubi treeneri ja ülikooli praktikumijuhendajaga.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) has integral knowledge about the work of assistant coach (EstQF3);
2) knows the principles of training and is able to organize and conduct sports training sessions
learning_outcomes.et: 2) tunneb treeningu põhiseisukohti ning oskab treeninguid organiseerida ja läbi viia

learning_outcomes.en: is capable to compile practice diary.
